input.sentences: he was in the back preparing all the food .
the liqueur was all lined up and ready to be poured .
he was very excited the night was going to go so well .
the appetizers were so classy looking .
output.sentences: The chef is preparing food for tonight.
One of the recipes requires pouring liqueur into it before it is ready to serve.
The guests are excited to taste his food.
Those are some classy appetizers to look at.
